# 13300

import sys

N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
t = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))

total = 0
start = 0
# 마지막 지점에서 대기 시간이 필요하지 않으므로 마지막 지점은 제외

for i in range(N):
    if t[i] < start:
        total += T
    else:
        total += T + t[i] - start
        start = t[i]

print(total)

import sys

N, M = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

t = [0] * N
for i in range(N):
    t[i] = int(sys.stdin.readline())
print(max(t) + M)

import sys

N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
t = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))

total = 0
start = 0

for i in range(N):
    if t[i] < start:
        total += T
    else:
        total += T + t[i] - start
        start = t[i] + T

print(total)

import sys

N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

x = 0
for i in range(N):
    t = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    x = max(x, t)
print(x + T)

import sys

N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
t = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))

total = 0
start = 0

for i in range(N):
    if t[i] < start:
        total += T
    else:
        total += t[i] - start
        start = t[i]

print(total)

# t = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))
N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
t = [int(input()) for i in range(N)]

total = 0
start = 0

for i in range(N):
    if t[i] < start:
        total += T
    else:
        total += T + t[i] - start
        start = t[i]

print(total)

import sys

N, T = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
t = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

total = 0
start = 0

for i in range(N):
    if t[i] < start:
        total += T
    else:
        total += T + t[i] - start
        start = t[i]

print(total)
